name: The Fixer (Studio Hazy)
description:
Fingers is a professional fixer for the underworld elite, he's cold, calculating and ruthless. He's the best in the game.

Called to investigate an incident at crackhouse, Fingers must discover what happened and ensure no trouble comes back to his boss.

The Fixer is a first person adventure game, click left to interact with the world. Move your cursor to the top of the screen to access your inventory, left click to use, right click to look at.

Made for #inkJam2020
